definition: A traditional dish typically made with boiled and sliced tuberous vegetables, often mixed with various seasonings, herbs, and dressings. It is commonly served as a side dish or appetizer in many cuisines.

examples.german: Kartoffelsalat ist ein beliebtes deutsches Gericht.
examples.english: Potato salad is a popular German dish.

examples.german: Meine Oma macht den besten Kartoffelsalat.
examples.english: My grandma makes the best potato salad.

examples.german: Kartoffelsalat wird oft als Beilage serviert.
examples.english: Potato salad is often served as a side dish.

examples.german: Ich esse gerne Kartoffelsalat mit Mayonnaise.
examples.english: I enjoy eating potato salad with mayonnaise.

examples.german: Kartoffelsalat kann warm oder kalt serviert werden.
examples.english: Potato salad can be served warm or cold.
